maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/0/.orig: Girl, you sure are a natural with that ball thing!
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/0/.text: А ты и правда хороша со всеми этими шарами, подруга!

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/0/.orig: Carla, they are called VRPs.\. Not "balls".
Ah, c'mon! Nobody calls them that anymore, y'know?
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/0/.text: Ай, да ладно! Никто их так больше не называет.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/30.orig: Well done!\. Yeah that was all.\. It's a small room.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/30.text: Отлично сработано!\. Да, это всё.\. Это маленькая комната.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: What are ya standing around here for?\. The wall is gone, the path is clear.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Ну, что ты здесь стоишь?\. Стена исчезла, путь свободен.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Up for some spoilers?
[nods]
Well something is different about this switch, right?
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Ну, этот переключатель чем-то отличается, так ведь?

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: I'm afraid one ball just won't cut it.
Now, several balls on the other hand...
[shakes head]
Right, then! Go on!
[Yes]
[No]
Nah, I won't give ya a hint for that, girl.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Неа, я не собираюсь тебе подсказывать, подруга.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: You removed the wall, the rest is straightforward.
Oh yeah, that one is kinda mean.\. Need a hint?
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Да, тут довольно хитро.\. Нужна подсказка?

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: [nods]
Did you try to hit this switch with charged balls?
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Ты пыталась попасть в этот переключатель заряженными шарами?

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: You probably realized that doesn't work.\. It's too slow.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: И наверняка поняла, что это не работает.\. Слишком медленно.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: How about you look around?\. There might be another way.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Как насчёт того, чтобы осмотреться?\. Может, найдётся другой способ.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: [shakes head]
Right, then! Go on!
[Yes]
[No]
Heh, this is so much fun.\. Just too bad we can't chat along the way...
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Хех, это так весело.\. Жаль, что мы не можем общаться по пути...

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Ah, don't worry!\. I'm sure Sergey will get the speech problem fixed in no time.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Ой, не волнуйся!\. Я уверена, Сергей в два счёта решит проблему с речью.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Am I right, Sergey?
It is...\. challenging to say the least.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Это...\. довольно непростая задача, мягко говоря.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: It wouldn't kill you to be a little more optimistic...
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Чуть больше оптимизма тебе не повредит...

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/34.orig: Entering the next stage, more switches await!
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/34.text: Переходим к следующему этапу, нас ждёт ещё больше переключателей!

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/46.orig:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/46.text:
Не туда, подруга.\.
Нужно добраться до телепорта!
